se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser

Class SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.DirectoryPrefixEnricher

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser.SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.DirectoryPrefixEnricher
  • Enclosing class:
    SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory

    public static class SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.DirectoryPrefixEnricher
extends Object
    Class which defines whether or not the name of the Project should be added as a prefix to SoftwareComponent directories when their names are synthesized. Given a SoftwareComponent configuration in a Project with the name foo, its API project directory name is
    • configuration-api if this DirectoryPrefixEnricher is given a false argument (or the method withoutProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix() is called.
    • foo-configuration-api if this DirectoryPrefixEnricher is given a true argument (or the method useProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix() is called.

    • Method Detail

      • prependProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix

        public SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.RelativePathEnricher prependProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix(boolean yes)
        Indicate if the Project's name should be prepended as a prefix to software component directory names. Given a SoftwareComponent configuration in a Project with the name foo, its API project directory name is
        • configuration-api if this method is called with the argument false.
        • foo-configuration-api if this method is called with the argument true.
        Parameters:
        yes - true to indicate that the project name should be added as a prefix to SoftwareComponent directories, and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The next BuilderStep subtype in the builder chain.

      • useProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix

        public SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.RelativePathEnricher useProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix()
        Convenience method calling return prependProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix(true);
        Returns:
        The next BuilderStep subtype in the builder chain.
        See Also:
        prependProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix(boolean)

      • withoutProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix

        public SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.RelativePathEnricher withoutProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix()
        Convenience method calling return prependProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix(false);
        Returns:
        The next BuilderStep subtype in the builder chain.
        See Also:
        prependProjectNameAsDirectoryPrefix(boolean)

      • validateRequiredKeyValuePair

        protected void validateRequiredKeyValuePair(String key)
        Validates that the given key is present within the pomTokens, and that it has a non-null value.
        Parameters:
        key - The token key.

      • isProjectSuffixRequired

        protected final boolean isProjectSuffixRequired()
        Returns:
        true if this Builder should have a project suffix, due to the PomType.

      • isParentPomType

        protected final boolean isParentPomType()
        Returns:
        true if the PomType of this BuilderStep is a Parent POM (as opposed to a Component POM).

      • isProjectNameAddedToDirectories

        protected boolean isProjectNameAddedToDirectories()
        Returns:
        true if this BuilderStep should add prefixes with the Project's name to local project directory names. This means that SoftwareComponent directories should be given names on the form foo-finance-api instead of finance-api, given that the project's name is foo and the SoftwareComponent's finance.

      • tokenize

        protected List<String> tokenize(String path)
        Converts the supplied path to a List of segments, assuming that the path uses '/' chars to separate directory names. Returning a List containing all directory names (i.e. path parts) in their order of occurrence.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to tokenize, assumed to use '/' as separator chars.
        Returns:
        A List whose elements contain the directory names within the supplied path.
